com.google.api.client.json
Class Json

java.lang.Object
  com.google.api.client.json.Json

public class Json
extends java.lang.Object

JSON utilities.

Upgrade warning: in prior version 1.2, there was a global static field JSON_FACTORY of type org.codehaus.jackson.JsonFactory. However, now that the JSON library is pluggable this doesn't make sense and instead the instance of the JSON factory must be specified every time it is used. For this reason much of the functionality that used be here has been moved to JsonFactory, JsonGenerator, and JsonParser.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Yaniv Inbar
